settings.title: Shipping information
settings.content:
Use collapsible tabs for more detailed information that will help customers make a purchasing decision.

Ex: Shipping and return policies, size guides, and other common questions.

settings.ct_tech_specs:
Technology

Monoshell in-mould – SUPERLIGHT technology
Fit

Extended coverage, compact design
Pads

Non allergenic washable comfort pads

Size (cm)

M (53-57), L (57-61)
Weight (g)

Medium - 260gr | Large - 285gr
Air Vents

22 air vents

Helmet LED Light

Available as an accessory
Ideal For

settings.code:
ALIEN

DEFY THE WIND, CONQUER THE TIME.

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/9lLnLWYFsyE?si=nJTyQSfgvh2OiSwT" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" allowfullscreen></iframe>

SUPERLIGHT TECHNOLOGY

A value of all Limar helmets, the lightness factor is the heart of every project.

The goal of total protection is always a priority; however, our goal is to offer the lightest and most comfortable product. Livigno weighs only 590 gr in size M.
